meanings.definition: The quality of being resolute or firm in purpose.
meanings.sent1: Her determinedness to finish her project impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: His determinedness to succeed in his career never wavered.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small size, the determinedness of the ant to carry the food was admirable.
meanings.sent4: The determinedness of the marathon runner to reach the finish line was like a force of nature.
meanings.sent5: The determinedness of the student to learn new things was inspiring to the teacher.

meanings.definition: The state of being decided or settled.
meanings.sent1: The determinedness of the schedule made it easy to plan the day.
meanings.sent2: After much discussion, the determinedness of the location for the party was finally agreed upon.
meanings.sent3: The determinedness of the weather to change suddenly kept everyone on their toes.
meanings.sent4: The determinedness of the puzzle pieces to fit together perfectly was satisfying.
meanings.sent5: The determinedness of the traffic light to stay red seemed endless.

meanings.definition: The act of reaching a decision or conclusion.
meanings.sent1: The determinedness of the jury to reach a verdict was evident in their expressions.
meanings.sent2: After much debate, the determinedness of the group to go for pizza was clear.
meanings.sent3: The determinedness of the coin to always land on heads was a mystery.
meanings.sent4: The determinedness of the detective to solve the case was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The determinedness of the clock to keep ticking reminded her of the passing time.
